text: allahanalli hagu antima dinadalli visvasavidada mattu allah mattavana dutaru nisedhisiruvudannu nisid'dhavendu pariganisadavara virud'dha hagu granthanidalpattavara paiki, satya dharmavannu svikarisadavara virud'dha yud'dha sariri – avaru tam'ma kaiyinda ‘jijhiya’ (danda) pavatisi, adhinaragi biduva tanaka
